# Erythromycin
---
title: Erythromycin
description: 
created: 09/01/2021
modified: 09/01/2021
tags: [drugs, antibiotics]
status: notes
url: erythromycin
---


* Erythromycin enhances the anticoagulant effect of warfarin. This can result in an increased INR and therefore increases the risk of bleeding.
